description:
A series of jewelry thefts have been terrorizing Tokyo. Rio`s in need of some money to pay her debts, unfortunately, the jewelry theft case has not been handed over to Team Warrior. Instead, Rio has to take a job tracking down a thief who`s been stealing women`s underwear. As she reaches the bottom of the underwear thefts, she believes she may have stumbled upon an even bigger case.
Source: Wiki
